content.description: Starts on good crimps on the left side of the roof and moves right through a large move, then a scary, loose top out.

Nick Duttle ( nickduttle.com/ ), after recently sending the famed Esperanza (V14), has added a new V14 in Hueco Tanks, Sôl Adûnâmentum. It is a direct start to Fern Roof and it finishes up on Wild Turkey. Nick has suggested hard V14 and if the grade holds it will be one of the hardest problems in Hueco Tanks and the USA. Sôl Adûnâmentum is on North Mountain, which means anyone can go there on anyday with out a tour guide. I am sure that this problem will recieve alot of attention this year. Well done Nick!
content.location:
It is a direct start to Fern Roof and it finishes up on Wild Turkey. 

b3bouldering.com/2007/12/09…

content.description: Start on the far left side of the roof on slopers. Work your way out through slopers and a key side pull using heel hooks to gain the start of 100 proof roof. Using the opposing crimps, make a big move right to the first good undercling. Keep shuffling your way right through the undercling jugs and then straight out towards the lip. Top out on the easy, but very tall, slab.
Start on the right side of the roof to the left of a fern-filled crack.  Move left and pull the roof to the scary, loose slab topout.

If you like burly campusing problems on good holds then this is for you.  Beware the finish is both tall and not super easy.  Start down under the roof with a good pocket and a marginal pinch.  Pull your feet off the ground and fire for the good crimp jug.  Match with some difficulty and get to the next section of good holds above.  This is where "Dope Fiend" V3 starts.  Continue up the wall on unchalked and scary holds until the angle finally breaks and you can romp up the easy slab.  Can descend on the boulder behind the problem.
content.protection: Several Pads and Spotters for the Finish
content.location: Far right side of Fern Wall, look for the obvious one hand pocket.

content.description: "Start at the lip on sloping hueco... Climb up and slightly left to a scary, loose upper section."
content.location: Far right side of Fern/100 Proof Roof wall near entrance to corridor leading to Big Time boulder.

content.description: Start in the middle of Wild Turkey on good holds with your feet on the big boulder.  Pull your legs up and throw for the big undercling.  Top out on the same scary, loose slab.
Exposed and sunny.  This area can be windy, so watch your crash pads.
